title: Artificial Intelligence Concepts: An Introduction (Online)
platform: Oxford University Department for Continuing Education
description: This course offers an essential introduction to AI topics, including historical development, theoretical foundations, applications, and ethical implications. It is designed for a general audience, including professionals and beginners in AI.

title: Technology and AI: Online Courses
platform: Oxford University Department for Continuing Education
description: These online courses provide flexible learning options covering various aspects of AI and technology. They are designed for professionals and those with no prior knowledge of AI.

title: Oxford Artificial Intelligence Programme
description: This programme is designed for managers, business leaders, and technical professionals. It covers AI mechanics, potential, challenges, social implications, and ethics, providing a comprehensive understanding of AI and machine learning.
